dd.p: The CurrentConnectorContext class, imported in the previous section, lets you create an object that will contain that is based on current user logon information.
Three elements let you construct an object for logon information:

ul.li: Printer3287LogonInfoItems class, for the creation of the object
CurrentConnectorContext class, for the insertion of current user information
the setLuName method of the Printer3287LogonInfoItems class

dd.p: Follow the procedure below to create a logon object.

stentry.draft-comment: This creates a logon information object for a connection that is defined by reference.
This sets the LU name for your logon information object. In the example code below, a logon information object named logoninfois created, for which the LU name is set to MyLu0000.
